oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Cased ambrotype of William Marion Fudge
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: William Marion Fudge was from Hawkins County and died during the Civil War and buried in Cole County, Illinois. He was born April 23, 1834 and married Eliza Ann Wilson who died in childbirth. She too is buried in Cole County, Illinois.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Fudge, William Marion
